mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_idx 'product_idx', g.goods_name 'name', g.goods_price 'price', g.goods_quantity 'quantity', g.goods_detail 'detail', g.goods_discount 'discount', g.goods_img 'img', g.goods_detail_img 'detail_img', v.ranking 'rank' FROM goods_sort_view v join goods g on g.goods_idx=v.goods_idx WHERE g.goods_idx=#{idx}
